channel.title: Custom Playbooks: Escape from Dino Island
channel.description:
I made some playbooks for Escape from Dino Island, as design exercise, and because it's a great game.
Check out the Lawyer, Spiritualist, and Baby Dino: https://billtherad.itch.io/escape-from-dino-island-custom-playbooks
The original designers were really enthusiastic about them. If you have a chance to check them out, or get to play with them yourself, I'd love to hear your thoughts!

item.title: Custom Playbooks: Escape from Dino Island
item.dc:creator: @seanpatrickcain
item.description:
@seanpatrickcain wrote:

Look like a lot of fun. (I’m imagining the player who bursts into the room, 45 minutes after the game begins, declaring themselves the baby dino and slamming that intro scene.)

Read full topic
item.source: Custom Playbooks: Escape from Dino Island
